channel.title: Comments on: HTML5 Shell for WordPress

item.title: By: mimoYmima
item.dc:creator: mimoYmima
item.description: hey that's only there when you're logged in as an admin to show you which template is being used while in development. If you want to get rid of it, it's the first thing in the functions.php file, just comment out the function or delete it.
item.content:encoded: hey that's only there when you're logged in as an admin to show you which template is being used while in development. If you want to get rid of it, it's the first thing in the functions.php file, just comment out the function or delete it.

item.title: By: Gareth Boughtwood
item.dc:creator: Gareth Boughtwood
item.description: Hi I am trying to use you're HTML5 Wordpress shell and I am having trouble getting rid of the url at the top of the page. It seems like its being added dynamically but I cant find from where?? It shows just under the body tag in firebug but i can't find the reference to it in the code??
item.content:encoded: Hi I am trying to use you're HTML5 WordPress shell and I am having trouble getting rid of the url at the top of the page. It seems like its being added dynamically but I cant find from where?? It shows just under the body tag in firebug but i can't find the reference to it in the code??
